alert.note: Alert for Grayson; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Alleghany and northeastern Ashe Counties in northwestern North Carolina, southwestern Wythe and Grayson Counties in southwestern Virginia through 300 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Piney Creek, or near Mouth Of Wilson, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galax... Sparta... Independence... Fries... Laurel Springs... Ennice... and Mouth Of Wilson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
